messages.subject: Planes pulling banners, was Re: Roof tops on cars OT?
messages.msgSnippet: ... fly ... Ooh, ooh, ooh... *I d* pull a banner behind my plane if someone hired me to fly it across the country to advertise the conference! Blue Skies,
messages.messageBody:
> From: kbcdlovejo@...
> And Ben wanted to know how many of you have seen the plane I've hired to
fly
> across the country advertising the conference! <BWG>
>
> ~Kelly


Ooh, ooh, ooh... *I'd* pull a banner behind my plane if someone hired me to
fly it across the country to advertise the conference!

Blue Skies,
-Robin-

Who can fly, but can't afford the fuel to get there! Let's see, 12 gallons
an hour, 140 mph, 3,000+ miles, that's over $500 just in gas. Um, my bill
for banner-pulling is $500 :-)
Really wishing I could be there, obviously.
